About Me

Hi there, I'm Mazen; I am a college student at Oregon State University, I am majoring in Computer Science Applied in Artificial Intelligence; with minor in Actuarial Science. I am an active memeber in OSU Machine Learning Club. I do some projects on GitHub to distract me from school. I am available for work. You could contact me.
